title: Hla mawi sak duh tak mai ka nei
lyrics:
Hla mawi sak duh tak mai ka nei,
Min tlan tawh avangin;
Ka Tlantu leh ka Lal chanchin,
Min tlan tahw avangin.

Min tlan tawh avangin. (2)
Isua hming ka chawimawi ang.
Min tlan tawh avangin,
Chhandamtu hming chu ka chawimawiang.

Krista min tilawmtu ka nei,
Min tlan tawh avangin;
A duhzawng tih ka lawmna hla,
Min tlan tawh avangin.

Hretu fiah dik tak mai ka nei,
Min tlantawh avangin;
Rinhlelh, hlauhna a tibo vek,
Min tlan tawh avangin.

Sawi thiam loh khawp lawmna ka nei,
Min tlan tawh avangin;
A thisen hlu tak mai chuanin,
Min tlan tawh avangin.

In ka nei, ka tan buatsaih sa,
Min tlan tawh avangin;
Tah chuan chatuanin ka chawl ang,
Min tlan tahw avangin.
